channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: GM tech executive shakeup continues on software team
item.description: Three of GM's top software executives have left the automaker in recent months, as the company moves to combine its disparate technology businesses.

item.title: New macOS malware chain could cause a major security headache - here's what we know
item.description: North Korean hackers are targeting macOS devs now with fake jobs and a ClickFix approach.

item.title: This Black Friday Sony soundbar deal will fix your TV’s awful audio for less than $100
item.description: The already-cheap Sony HT-S100F just got a mega discount for Black Friday, making it the ideal bargain for anyone hoping to upgrade from basic TV audio.

item.title: I've hand-picked the 3 best robot vacuums we've tried and tested under $500 for Black Friday
item.description: Robot vacuums don't always have to be expensive. Sure, you lose out on some more premium features and some build quality, but there are plenty of automated and capable floor cleaners on offer this Black Friday for less than $500.

item.title: Amazon propose la puissance du MSI Sword 16 et de sa RTX 4070 avec 700 € de moins durant la Black Friday Week
item.description: Avec sa Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 et ses 16 Go de RAM, le MSI Sword 16 pourra vous accompagner dans vos parties les plus endiablées. Pour la Black Friday Week, Amazon baisse son prix et le propose à 999 euros contre 1 699 euros lors de son lancement.

item.title: The Best Phones You Can Buy in 2025
item.description: Whether you're on Team iPhone or Android, like flat phones or foldables, we've found the best phones released this year.

item.title: Meta Quest Black Friday deals are live – here are the biggest discounts on the world’s best VR headset
item.description: Black Friday Meta Quest 3 and Meta Quest 3S deals are here, these are the best I've found.

item.title: Trump-Backed Crypto Company Promotes ‘Shit Piss Skin Can’ Coin
item.description: "Stop this boring insider trading," one X user complained.

item.title: Ikea just made speakers you’ll actually want to display
item.description: It’s a lamp! It’s a print! It’s . . . a speaker? Ikea just launched a new collection of speakers that double as actual pieces of art.

item.title: This stunning, one-off Leica belonging to the late Pope Francis just raised $7.5 million for charity – here are its 7 unique features
item.description: Leica has just sold a unique M-A camera belonging to the late Pope Francis to raise millions for charity –here's what it looks like.

item.title: Test du Xiaomi Poco F8 Ultra : à deux doigts de la perfection !
item.description: Xiaomi lance donc son nouveau Poco F8 Ultra, son navire-amiral pour les gamers qui recherchent l’excellence en matière de performances, tout en ayant un smartphone polyvalent qui ne les ruinera pas. Le constructeur semblait très confiant lors de sa présentation, nous l’avons mis à l’épreuve du feu.

item.title: The best compact cameras for 2025: tried and tested pocket choices to take anywhere
item.description: Our best compact camera for 2025 guide will help you find the right pocket camera for you, whatever your budget.

item.title: Please don't date your AI because it will never love you or pick up the check
item.description: The latest marketing scheme from EVA AI is an AI Dating Cafe, and it's obviously a terrible idea

item.title: Poco’s new flagship phone has a mini Bose subwoofer for 2.1-channel audio – and I hope I’m not near one on the bus
item.description: The Poco F8 Ultra might be able to replace your portable speaker, and it has got high-end specs too.

item.title: These OLED TVs from LG, Samsung and more are the most affordable Black Friday deals I've seen
item.description: Check out these Black Friday deals that make some of the more affordable OLED TVs a bit cheaper.

item.title: Breaking down the boom in the Nordic’s startup ecosystem
item.description: On this week’s Equity, we sat down with Dennis Green-Lieber, the founder of the AI company Propane, to talk about the booming success of the Nordic ecosystem.

item.title: Save $250 on the brilliant Google Pixel 10 Pro with this record-low Black Friday deal
item.description: The Google Pixel 10 Pro costs less than a typical flagship this Black Friday thanks to this record-low deal

item.title: Here are 85 Walmart Black Friday deals actually worth buying – big-screen TVs, air fryers, Apple, Lego, and more
item.description: I'm rounding up the 85 best Walmart Black Friday deals worth buying, from Apple, Lego, Ninja, and more, plus information on when stores open on Black Friday.

item.title: DeleteMe has discounted all plans by 30% - scrub your data from the internet for less this Black Friday
item.description: One of the best data removal services, DeleteMe, has a super 30% discount code that works on all plans.

item.title: Préparez-vous à l’inévitable future hausse des prix de Spotify
item.description: Aussi sûrement que le printemps succède à l'hiver, une nouvelle augmentation des prix chez Spotify finira bien par arriver. Ce devrait être le cas aux États-Unis au premier trimestre 2026, et probablement ailleurs dans le monde dans la foulée. En cause : l'industrie du disque veut augmenter sa part des revenus sur les abonnements.

item.title: I was skeptical about the Nothing Phone 3, but after a month of testing, I finally get what it's all about
item.description: The Nothing Phone 3 matches Samsung and Apple flagships in price, but has its own novel appeal.

item.title: I review electric toothbrushes, and these 69% discounts for Black Friday have to be seen to be believed
item.description: Huge Black Friday electric toothbrush deals – save up to 69% on Suri, Oral-B, Philips and more.

item.title: The best Dyson Black Friday deals on everything from vacuums to Airwraps – hand-picked by a Homes Editor
item.description: There are plenty of big Dyson discounts around, but some are better than others.

item.title: Looking for an amazing saving? This exclusive IDrive deal is the biggest cloud storage discount we've seen this Black Friday
item.description: Get a huge 95% off IDrive - exclusive for TechRadar readers this Black Friday.

item.title: Le dernier smartphone haut de gamme de Xiaomi a déjà une promotion de 200 € sur Amazon
item.description: Alors qu'il vient à peine d'être annoncé, le Xiaomi Poco F8 Ultra s'offre déjà une première remise de 200 euros chez Amazon, passant de 899 euros à 699 euros en validant le coupon.

item.title: That ‘Pluribus’ Cameo Was Exactly Who You Thought It Was
item.description: Rhea Seehorn didn't know a former castmate would be popping up until she was actually filming a key moment in this week's episode.

item.title: How to watch Atletico Madrid vs Inter Milan: Free streams, TV channels and preview for Champions League contest
item.description: We'll show you all the ways you can watch Atletico Madrid vs Inter Milan in the UEFA Champions League from anywhere in the world this Wednesday.

item.title: X’s new feature revealed many popular U.S. political accounts are located in other countries
item.description: Elon Musk’s X unveiled a feature Saturday that lets users see where an account is based. They go by names like @TRUMP_ARMY— or @MAGANationX, and their verified accounts proudly display portraits of President Donald Trump, voter rallies, and American flags. And they’re constantly posting about U.S. politics to their followers, sounding like diehard fans of the president....

item.title: AWS might now have around 900 data centers - that's twice as many as previously thought
item.description: Amazon might be approaching 1,000 data centers globally, but it’ll likely never confirm that outright.

item.title: Microsoft’s latest 13-inch Surface Laptop is down to $549.99, a new record low price
item.description: If you’re a Windows user looking for something that comes close to Apple’s latest MacBook Air, Microsoft’s newest 13-inch Surface Laptop — officially called the Surface Laptop 13-inch 1st Edition with Snapdragon — is a great option. Right now, you can pick up the model with an 8-core Qualcomm Snapdragon X Plus processor, 16GB of […]

item.title: WhatsApp : vos conversations ChatGPT vont disparaître, voici la date limite pour les sauver
item.description: Dès le 15 janvier 2026, ChatGPT et Copilot disparaîtront de WhatsApp. Meta bloque ses rivaux pour imposer sa propre IA. Voici comment ne pas perdre vos données.

item.title: La Renault Twingo électrique à 14 000 euros ? Le bonus écologique va augmenter en 2026
item.description: Roland Lescure, ministre de l'Économie, a annoncé ce matin la prolongation du bonus écologique en 2026 et une augmentation de la surprime pour les voitures électriques produites en Europe. Le montant pourrait alors aller jusqu'à 5 700 euros.

item.title: The excellent Razer Wolverine V3 Pro controller just got a seriously tempting 20% discount for Black Friday
item.description: Want a premium Xbox and PC controller for less? Don't miss the Razer Wolverine V3 Pro's biggest ever discount – save 20%.

item.title: Musk’s xAI to build small solar farm adjacent to Colossus data center
item.description: The artificial intelligence company said it was working with a developer to build a solar farm on 88 acres next to its Memphis site. Given the proposed size, the solar farm would likely produce around 30 megawatts of electricity, only about 10% of the data center’s estimated power use.

item.title: Pentagon Investigating Former Astronaut Mark Kelly Over ‘Illegal Orders’ Video
item.description: "If this is meant to intimidate me...it won’t work."

item.title: Le Black Friday fait baisser les prix des tablettes : le top des deals sur les Samsung Galaxy Tab, iPad Air, Lenovo Idea Tab…
item.description: Les tablettes tactiles connaissent une belle remontée de popularité, sans doute car beaucoup de modèles abordables mais qualitatifs sont sortis chez des fabricants tels que Xiaomi ou Lenovo. Samsung et Apple proposent quant à eux toujours de beaux produits haut de gamme.

item.title: Android-powered desktop PCs are coming – and I think they'll be an exciting step up from ChromeOS
item.description: We know a lot more about Google's grand plan for an Android-based 'Aluminium OS' to take over from ChromeOS.

item.title: « Pas de prise, pas de voiture » : on a fact-checké les propos du patron de 40 millions d’automobilistes sur la voiture électrique
item.description: C'est fascinant et terrifiant à la fois. Lors de notre débat sur l'échéance 2035, Pierre Chasseray, délégué général de 40 millions d'automobilistes, a déroulé un argumentaire contre la voiture électrique. Le problème ? Ses arguments datent d'il y a dix ans.

item.title: New View of Iconic Butterfly Nebula Is Shockingly Gorgeous
item.description: The Gemini South telescope in Chile captured this stunning view of NGC 6302, highlighting the nebula’s intricate structure and dynamic gas flows.

item.title: Beat the Xbox Game Pass Ultimate price hikes with this Black Friday deal
item.description: Stock up on Xbox Game Pass Ultimate at Amazon now to beat the recent price hikes.

item.title: Fanttik’s portable tire inflator has hit an all-time low for Black Friday
item.description: We’re on the cusp of Black Friday, and while TVs and laptop deals get all the glory, practical gadgets are already on sale too. Fanttik’s X8 portable tire inflator is down to $69.99 ($40 off), an all-time low price at Amazon. Fanttik’s deal is only available for Amazon Prime subscribers. The X8 is a battery-powered […]

item.title: Norton VPN vs Bitdefender VPN – are antivirus VPNs really worth your money this Black Friday?
item.description: Is it time to bag a bundle?

item.title: Watching Zootopia 2 this weekend? Stream its fantastic forebear first with this cost-cutting Disney+ Black Friday deal
item.description: Stop spitting feathers over Zootopia 2's Disney+ release – let this cost-cutting Black Friday offer make you purr with delight instead.

item.title: RealPage barred from using real-time data to set rents under new DOJ settlement
item.description: Instead, the only nonpublic data that RealPage can use to train its software’s algorithm must be at least one year old. Landlords could no longer rely on rent-pricing software to quietly track each other’s moves and push rents higher using confidential data, under a settlement between RealPage Inc. and federal prosecutors to end what critics said was illegal “algorithmic collusion.”...

item.title: Boulanger fait le plein d’offres pour la Black Friday Week, mais voici celles qui méritent votre argent
item.description: En attendant le véritable Vendredi noir, Boulanger ne cesse de proposer de bonnes affaires sur son site et va jusqu'à proposer un code promo pour baisser davantage le prix des téléviseurs. Si vous êtes intéressé, retrouvez ici les offres qui valent réellement le coup.

item.title: « Plus rapide et plus efficace » : Volkswagen prend une décision historique et radicale pour ses prochaines voitures électriques
item.description: Volkswagen vient d'inaugurer à Hefei, en Chine, son complexe de développement le plus abouti jamais construit en dehors de son territoire historique. Une première pour un constructeur qui n'avait jamais quitté ses bases en ce qui concerne la R&D.

item.title: Amazon n’hésite pas à vendre au rabais de nombreux produits Tech lors de la Black Friday Week
item.description: La Black Friday Week s'apprête à se faire remplacer prochainement par le véritable Black Friday ce vendredi. En attendant, Amazon continue de balancer de nouvelles offres sur son site et voici celles qu'il faut retenir.

item.title: ExpressVPN's Black Friday VPN deal is now official with 30% off and 4 months free
item.description: ExpressVPN has officially launched its Black Friday VPN deal for 2025, and it's a biggie. The provider has dropped to its lowest-ever price, and is also offering 4 extra months with the deal.

item.title: Fnac et Darty frappent fort pour la Black Friday Week : voici les 16 pépites à saisir
item.description: Fnac et Darty continuent de balancer leurs meilleures offres pour la Black Friday Week. On trouve un tas de produits à prix cassés : smartphones, téléviseurs, PC portables... Il y a de quoi se faire plaisir !

item.title: Pour le Black Friday, RED vous propose la fibre 1 Gb/s sans engagement la moins chère du moment [Sponso]
item.description: Parmi les offres box pas chères, la nouvelle proposition de RED by SFR pourrait bien être la plus intéressante. L'opérateur propose en effet l'abonnement 1 Gb/s sans engagement le moins cher du secteur.
